title: A Cumulative Sum Problem
text:
Given an array a0of sizen(1<n<105). Find the array akmodulo (7340033)where ak= cumulative summation array of the arrayak-1.Means,ak[1] =ak-1[1]for i > 1 ,ak[i] =ak[i-1] +ak-1[i]Givenk(0<k<105)Can you find the array akefficiently?For example,IfÂ  a0= {1, 2, 1, 3},a1= {1, 3, 4, 7}a2= {1, 4, 8, 15}a3= {1, 5, 13, 28}InputFirst line will contain two integern,k(size of the array andkfrom the problem description)Following n positive integers separated by spaces denoting array a0.All integers are smaller than 105.OutputOutput n integers of the arrayakwith spaces in between.ExampleInput:4 2
1 2 1 3Output:1 4 8 15
